articles.title: Greetings to Mexican President
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Myanmar Friendship Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Myanmar Friendship Delegation 
   Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Myanmar friendship delegation headed by Aung Thein Lynn, mayor of Yangon City and chairman of the Yangon City Development Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday when it paid a courtesy call on him.
